title: Benchmarking spatial domain identification in colorectal cancer Visium data: stability, coherence, and practical compute considerations
description: Reproducible benchmark of spatial domain identification methods in colorectal cancer (CRC) Visium spatial transcriptomics data, including prespecified statistical decision rules, stability auditing, and supporting data tables.

creators.name: Zheng, Hongwei
